question: In the whole year which are those days fasting is prohibited ...
answer:
QUESTION
(for example in eid-ul-fitr and eid-ul-zuha we are not permitted for fasting... so can you please tell me other than these days which are not permitted....)
ANSWER


Share:
Five days in which fasting is prohibited; Eidul Fitr, Eidul Adha and the three days after Eidul Adhaa (11, 12 and 13 of Dhul Hijjah).

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best
